data.title: Time Zone & Clock Changes in Yorkton, Saskatchewan, Canada
data.meta_description: Historic, present and future dates for daylight saving time and clock changes. Time changes between years 2020 and 2029 in Canada – Saskatchewan – Yorkton are shown here.

The graph above shows that there is no clock change in Yorkton during 2024.

Time Changes in Yorkton Over the Years

Daylight Saving Time (DST) changes do not necessarily occur on the same date every year.

Time zone changes for:

YearDate & TimeAbbreviationTime ChangeOffset After2020 — 2029No changes, UTC -6 hours all of the period

* All times are local Yorkton time.

Data for the years before 1970 is not available for Yorkton, however, we have earlier time zone history for Regina available.
